name: Donny Donut 3 (PC & Android)
description:
INCLUDING ANDROID VERSION

STORY

Donny wakes up in Cyber Land, where he meets Pixie, a pixel. With his new friend, Donny will travel in a city, cyberpunk streets and... your computer's bin?! Donny's objective is to find his sibblings, who where captured by a new evil face... (not burger king this time). Will you be up to the challenge ?

FEATURES

  • Earn more EXP on your GameJolt account with the TROPHIES (achievements) in game! (Needs internet and GJ account)
  • Cutscenes to fit in the game's story
  • Soundtrack that slaps (review from my mom) also available on Spotify and more
  • TRANSLATED in VARIOUS languages*
  • and... that's it?

SOUNDTRACK

The soundtrack is available on Spotify, Deezer, YT Music, Apple Music, Bandcamp, everywhere you want (first time i publish soundtrack on spotify btw)

https://open.spotify.com/artist/5AjBxYzFQqrCZqFYSJwfRt?si=ttmPcgaUSMeRpuePNp2Ebw

*Languages supported are English, French and Japanese for now. Maybe releasing other languages soon.
